projects.title: IMDb API
projects.description: An IMDb scraper built on Node.js with an extensive API to fetch titles and watchlists

projects.title: vue-imdb
projects.description: A Vue.js component using the previous IMDb API service to render a user's watchlist

projects.title: encrypt0r
projects.description: An Electron app to encrypt/decrypt your files by setting a passphrase

projects.title: Custom 404 Pro
projects.description: A WordPress plugin (with over 80,000+ installs) that allows you to replace the default 404 page with a custom page.

projects.title: vue-base-components
projects.description: A collection of pre-built base components to jumpstart your brand new Vue.js project.

projects.title: jquery.peekABar
projects.description: A jQuery notification bar plugin with multiple customization options

projects.title: jquery.ghostfm
projects.description: Showcase your last.fm listening history using this jQuery widget with a minimalist mode as well.

tinkers.title: HighCharts to PDF
tinkers.description: A fiddle on how to export multiple graphs in Highcharts to a PDF using jsPDF.

tinkers.title: MailChimp Signup Form
tinkers.description: Interactive registration form to enable users to signup easily.

tinkers.title: Clipboard Demo
tinkers.description: Demos to copy input/paragraph elements to the Clipboard using native browser APIs

tinkers.title: YouTube Jukebox
tinkers.description: A temporary sidebar playlist to quickly add videos to from YouTube, kinda like a jukebox.

tinkers.title: AdStomp
tinkers.description: A Chrome Extension to block ads on news-reading websites. Also integrates a custom reader mode.

tinkers.title: Node.js file upload
tinkers.description: A Node.js demo to upload a file and get percentage based updates on upload progress
